description: Retrieves a list of the available releases for the mobile SDK and the specified device platform. The mobile SDK is not generally available. Customers who have access to the mobile SDK can use it to establish and manage WAF tokens for use in HTTP(S) requests from a mobile device to WAF. For more information, see WAF client application integration in the WAF Developer Guide.

parameters.name: Platform
parameters.description: The device platform to retrieve the list for.

nested_items.name: ReleaseSummaries
nested_items.description: The high level information for the available SDK releases. If you specified a Limit in your request, this might not be the full list.

nested_items.name: NextMarker
nested_items.description: When you request a list of objects with a Limit setting, if the number of objects that are still available for retrieval exceeds the limit, WAF returns a NextMarker value in the response. To retrieve the next batch of objects, provide the marker from the prior call in your next request.
